definition: to emerge victorious in every battle/to be ever-victorious
hundred/numerous/all kinds of
surname Bai
to fight/fight/war/battle
hundred/numerous/all kinds of
surname Bai

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)

sentences.english: He is nearly ever successful on the market, ever-victorious.
sentences.chinese: 他在商場上幾乎無往不利，百戰百勝。

sentences.english: His Troglodyte hordes are feared the world over, especially in the dark tunnels of Nighon.
sentences.chinese: 他的洞穴人軍隊在尼根黑暗的坑道中百戰百勝。

sentences.english: This psychological tactics used properly, without the.
sentences.chinese: 這種心理戰術運用得當，無不百戰百勝。

virtue has its rewards (idiom); one good turn deserves another
